name: Draw No More
description:
CREATED FOR O2A2 JAM 2021

A girl in the seat, the artist behind the easel. They have a conversation. The girl's heart is shattered, and the artist's wrist moves no more.

CREDITS

  • Story / Code / Art - shino
  • Editing - IronForPistons
  • Music - Eric Matyas : http://www.soundimage.org/

Please enjoy this bite-sized story of about 1000 words!

Note: 

I recommend not playing this game when your eyes are tired due to the light color scheme.
